sentences: In 2006 Cosmo wrote and produced the debut album Alien for the band Cosmo on Frontiers Records, which featured his father Fran Cosmo on vocals.
Early in 2011 Cosmo became the spokesmodel and the face of Famous Vodka.
Cosmo released his solo debut album, was honored as best in class at F.Y.E., and featured on WKTV Live for his debut signing.
